createPlaylist.PLAYLIST_NAME_EXISTS: There is already a playlist named **{{playlistName}}** in your saved playlists!
createPlaylist.GENERIC_ERROR: There was a problem executing this command, please try again later

deletePlaylist.PLAYLIST_REMOVED: I removed **{{playlistName}}** from your saved playlists!

leave.NOT_IN_VC: Please join a voice channel and try again!
leave.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
leave.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!

loopQueue.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
loopQueue.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
loopQueue.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to use that!
loopQueue.LOOP_SONG_ON: :x: Turn off the **loop** command before using the **loopqueue** command
loopQueue.LOOP_DISABLED: :repeat: The queue is no longer playing on **loop**
loopQueue.LOOP_ENABLED: :repeat: The queue is now playing on **loop**

loop.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
loop.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
loop.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!
loop.LOOP_DISABLED: **{{song}}** is no longer playing on repeat :repeat:

lyrics.SONG_NOT_FOUND: :x: No song has been found for this query
lyrics.GENERIC_ERROR: There was a problem fetching lyrics for this song, please try again
lyrics.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing! Enter a song name or play a song
lyrics.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!

move.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
move.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
move.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!
move.INVALID_POSITION: :x: Try again and enter a valid song position number
